title: ‘Rust’ Crew Member Files Lawsuit, Alleging Negligence Led to Fatal Shooting
sub_head: Electrician sues producers, star Alec Baldwin and crew members who handled gun, seeking damages
body:
An electrician on the movie “Rust” has sued producers, star Alec Baldwin and several crew members, alleging negligence led to the fatal shooting of the film’s cinematographer and wounding of the director.
Serge Svetnoy, an electrician who said he witnessed the shooting last month, alleged in his lawsuit that producers, crew members and Mr. Baldwin didn’t follow movie-industry safety standards for firearms, allowed real bullets to make it onto the set and failed to hire an experienced gun handler, known as the armorer on movie sets.
